review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2022
name: RJA
title: Love this drawing board!
review: All kiddos will love this. It's so easy to use. Even my husband and I find ourselves playing with it. When you need the magnets to go back down, it's almost like a pop it toy.

title: Fun, creative, self contained.
review: Nice amount of sections for more creative designs. Entertaining for a wide range of ages.

title: Cool thing
review: Pretty cool toy. Kid spends a good amount of time on it

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2022
name: Shannon P. Johnson
title: Magnets don't stay put - terrible quality
review: I purchased this as a gift for my niece because my son has one (a different brand) and she loved his! What a disappointment! The magnet balls don't stay up when you use the pen, so it's basically useless. I'll be returning it.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2022

title: Children love it
review: It was a gift for my granddaughter and she loved it. Her little friends at her birthday party all played with it. It will great when they travel.

review: I use in ECSE classroom and my students love the magnetic beads popping up with the pen !

review: my daughter likes it, so I like it. However the design could be a tad better. Magnet isn’t the strongest but it works.

review: Great for gifting. Made well. Packaged nicely. Would recommend.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2022

review: Our 5 yr old loves this! We gave it to him for Christmas and he sits for hours. Such a fun and creative toy

review: This is so much fun, not only does the 5 year old like it but the older kids took turns playing with it!

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2021

review: Highly recommend, it's a great fidget toy. My son with autism loves it! Thank you!

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2021

title: it's fine
review: nice product but this brand is not very good in my opinion, the iron balls don't stay enough in their spot

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2021
name: voodoo1492
title: Disappointment
review: Cool concept, but not practical. The beads didn't stay in place while drawing.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2021
name: LadyMe
title: Poor quality
review: Got this since it was cheaper than another brand we previously bought, but one of the ball bearings wouldn’t stay in the hole. We got a replacement and it had the same issue, so we ended up returning it and just going with the more expensive but clearly better quality brand.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2021
name: Amy
title: Not incredible, but ok for my purpose
review: This has a LOT of beads that won't stay up right out of the box. Nearly 10%, which seems abnormally high. I would never ever give this as a gift to someone else. That said, my kids are really young and don't particularly care if one bead or another won't stay up. We'll keep it, but I'm a bit disappointed.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2021
name: Hailey Silcott
title: Disappointed
review: Half the beads do not stay up when trying to draw something and it is incredibly frustrating.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2021
name: Elaine
title: Not great
review: I have other versions of this kind of product and yes, the magnet balls do fall down SOME in all of them. But with this one, they never even come up half the time. I work on prewriting with kids and they can make simply lines because the magnets arent strong enough to come to the surface. I do really like that you can place it at a slant though!! Maybe I just have a fluke one, I dont know...

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2021
name: Amazon Customer
title: Worked ok but some magnets did not stay up
review: I liked the concept. Board was made well. I liked that it was an all contained entertainment item

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2020
name: BlackHeartNY
title: Cute Toy But...
review: I thought this would be a nice toy for my Grandson to do his own thing, or for us to draw together.It would be so much better if the beads actually stayed put in the holes when the pen places them there.They don't.The beads in this particular board look a lot smaller than the beads in the ABC board.They constantly fall back into the hole in certain spaces on the board, which ruins anything you might draw.Disappointed.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2020
name: k
title: Didn’t work
review: Couldn’t make lines or drawings with this because many of the little balls won’t stay in the holes. Returned.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2020
name: Byron Jolly
title: Child tested Grandparent approved
review: As a grandparent finding enter active toys to engage a child’s brain and motor skills is almost impossible. The Picasso tiles board checks all the boxes.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2020
name: HLHS Warrior Family
title: Great Creative Fun!
review: This was a favorite at our 3 year olds birthday party! Children of all ages and adults alike loved this drawing board! It does require some patience to draw carefully with the magnet but if you make a mistake, all you need to do is pop out the ball! I appreciate this board which encourages creativity, focus, and patience and we will be gifting one to all of the kids in our lives for their upcoming birthdays!

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2019
name: Shield
title: Disappointed
review: Got this for my son for Christmas. Some of the balls just won’t stay and fall making it hard to create certain shapes.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2019
name: Alan
title: Very difficult to draw
review: I dont recommend this product.It is very difficult to draw lines. You pretty much have to poke the pen in every hole to pull the ball up. You cant just run the pen across and make the balls come up. Also, when drawing, you'll come across a situation where you will pull one ball up and the magnetism affects other balls that have been pulled up previously. itll create a repulsive force and make another ball someplace else fall. This is a horrible toy that never should have made it past testing. Its junk.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2019
name: Holly
title: Better than screen time! All ages enjoy
review: All my kids LOVE this- ages 4, 6, & 7. We bring it on long car rides, to doctor appointments, anywhere they need to be entertained. Much better for their brains than screen time! Each age uses it a bit differently which is neat to see. Randomly doodles, practicing abcs and shapes, playing tic tac toe, or making more elaborate designs. I even have fun with it! Love that there are no loose pieces. Except the pen. One related tip - Be sure to attach the pen to the handle with a string.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2019
name: Toni Yazurlo
title: Very sturdy
review: My daughter loved this. She is 4 years old and was able to use this with no problem. Was great for the car as well.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2019
name: unsure
title: Good for kids
review: My boy likes it

review_data: Reviewed in the United States 🇺🇸 on November 2, 2019

title: Great toy and mess free
review: Awesome toy and complete mess free for kids, and it’s really creative! I wish that the pen was somehow connected with the board so the kid won’t forget where she put it.Overall, we love it!!

review: We LOVE this thing! My daughter will play with it for hours! It’s a little loud for the car though. Lol we immediately bought 2 more as gifts!
